location_working: From 8.00 a.m. to 11.00 p.m. - buffet breakfasts
location_working_ind: from 12.00 p.m. to the last guest you may enjoy special menu in our restaurant (in summer season - from Friday to Sunday)
location_description: Panoramic gourmet restaurant is located on the second floor of Wellness & SPA building.
location_description_1: The wine menu comprises wines with marvelous and amazing flavours, the Coravin technology allows getting acquainted with wine masterpieces ordering just a glass instead of a whole bottle.
location_description_2: An atmospheric venue for romantic and business meetings, big events and special evenings for good cheer.
